Change Log

August 2008

Value of fields Latitude and Longitude from Hotels table is provided to Basic users.

October 2008

A new console execution mode has been implemented. This modification allows the users to schedule the execution of application.

April 2009

All records have been inserted after a failure in a batch for Oracle and Access drivers. Double foreign keys were added in Access. More information was added to the log.

July 2009

For basic version, two more fields were added to HotelDescriptions: HotelHowToGetThere and HotelComments. For SQL Server database, case sensitive columns are accepted.
